attempts.description: The number of retry attempts for the Batch job

image.description: Image for the Batch job (if no job definition was provided). Use '' to indicate that it will be substituted in by a CWL dockerPull requirement

jobDefinition.description: The name of the Batch job definition

jobQueue.description: The name of the Batch job queue

jobName.description: The name of the Batch job to be created

memory.description: Amount of memory for the Batch job, in MiB

regionName.description: The name of the region that Batch runs in

pollingInterval.description: Time interval (in seconds) between consecutive termination checks

timeout.description: Time for Batch job to run before timing out

transferBufferSize.description: Buffer size allocated for local and remote data transfers

vcpus.description: The number of vcpus for the Batch job
